name: CARDCORE
description:
It's a TOTALLY FREE card game. We hate restrictions so there are NO timers, pay-to-win, energy bars and the like in the game. A player can purchase a skin for his avatar only.

CARDCORE is a pure PvP focused LCG that was born from our CCG Azorian Kings.

In order to make the game equal for all we give ALL the cards to players at the start. You get 400+ cards of six races and all 12 warlords! You are free to make any experiments. No limits: you can play as you want and how much you want.

Enjoy the original and deep card game for FREE :)

P.S.: in case you're looking for PvE experience we've added the Azorian Kings banner into the game. The whole world of Azoria (campaign, quests, challenges and events, cross-play with CARDCORE players) is waiting for you here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/640850/Azorian_Kings/
Sincerely yours,
Daizor
